body_html:
PluginArray seems to implement the iterator protocol, so it works fine:

>> for (let plugin of navigator.plugins) { console.log(plugin); }
Plugin { application/googletalk: MimeType, description: "Version: 5.41.0.0", filename: "libnpgoogletalk.so", version: "", name: "Google Talk Plugin", length: 1, 1 more… }
Plugin { application/o1d: MimeType, description: "Version: 5.41.0.0", filename: "libnpo1d.so", version: "", name: "Google Talk Plugin Video Renderer", length: 1, 1 more… }

I don't know about Array.from in Firefox though.
